--- title: "Torneo Di Calcio S. Martino Di Castrozza" date: "1993-08-01" author: "Adrian Joseph" image: https://storage.googleapis.com/blogs_josa/sport/1993_TORNEO_CALCIO_S._MARTINO_DI_CASTROZZA/img/01.png categories: [race report, random race] format: html lightbox: match: auto effect: fade desc-position: right loop: false --- ![First place](https://storage.googleapis.com/blogs_josa/sport/1993_TORNEO_CALCIO_S._MARTINO_DI_CASTROZZA/img/01.png) When I was a kid I was going to summer and winter camps organized by some religious organisation. This particular one was a summer camp in the Alps, in S. Martino Di Castrozza. Within the summer camp, there was a soccer tournament between teams of different camps. I do not have too many memory about, I do not even remember if I was playing goalkeeper, defender, or striker. Most likely defender, but I could not guarantee it. But two things I do remember: it was a gravel football pitch behind a church, and, more importantly: we won the tournament! ::: {.cell} ::: ## Summary ```{=html}
Position overall: 1
